name: Tessera
description:
Tessera is a game full of action, puzzles and 2D platforming, where we must face  or avoid various enemies and traps.

This game was created for the Game Jam Cultura Abierta, 4th Edition.

Team

Abraham González Fernández - Music/FX

Alberto Benítez - Level Design

Alejandro Pérez Jodar - Animation/Modeling

Juan Nicolás Oliveros Ramírez - 2D Art

Sabrina Purswani - Scripting

Sergio Cristauro - Scripting

Yeray Carvajal Silva - Game Design & Level Design
